feed.title: West Coast Vancouver Island North - Marine Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT, West Coast Vancouver Island North
Forecast for Today Tonight and Wednesday. - West Coast Vancouver Island North
entry.summary:
Wind southeast 25 to 35 knots increasing to southeast 35 to 45 this afternoon except southwest 15 offshore this evening. Wind diminishing to west 10 to 15 after midnight then backing to southwest 10 to 15 Wednesday morning. Periods of rain changing to chance of showers Wednesday.
Issued 10:30 AM PDT 12 June 2018

entry.title: Waves for Today Tonight and Wednesday. - West Coast Vancouver Island North
entry.summary:
Seas 1 to 2 metres building to 2 to 3 this morning and to 3 to 4 late this afternoon. Seas subsiding to 2 to 3 late overnight and to 1 to 2 Wednesday morning.
Issued 04:00 AM PDT 12 June 2018

entry.title: Extended Forecast - West Coast Vancouver Island North
entry.summary:
Thursday: Wind light increasing to northwest 10 to 20 knots in the afternoon.
Friday: Wind northwest 15 to 25 knots increasing to northwest 25 to 35.
Saturday: Wind northwest 25 to 35 knots.
Issued 04:00 AM PDT 12 June 2018
